price: A ranar da Allah Yake tãra manzanni sa'an nan Ya ce: "Mene ne aka karɓa muku?" (zã) su ce: "Bãbu ilmi a gare mu. Lalle ne Kai, Kai ne Masanin abubuwan fake."*
arabic: ۞ يَوۡمَ يَجۡمَعُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أُجِبۡتُمۡۖ قَالُواْ لَا عِلۡمَ لَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ
footnotes: * A nan hukunce-hukuncen alkawurra suka ƙãre a wannan sura daga ãyã ta sama da wannan. Kuma da wannan ãyã ta l09 Allah Yanã yi mana hikãyar abin da zai auku a Lãhira da bincinken Sa ga tsare alkawari, kõ rashin tsarewa. Ya fãra da Annabãwan Sa. Ya aiko, da ƙarin bãyani a kan irin muhãwarar da zã ta shiga a tsakãnin Sa da Annabãwa.Yã yi misãli da Ĩsã dõmin mutanensa nã nan a cikin wannan al'umma, anã kiran su zuwa ga musulunci, kuma domin shine Annabi na ƙarshen da ba a manta abubuwan da mutanensa suka yi ba a gabanin ɗauke shi ɗin.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma yajmaʿu al-lahu al-rusula fayaqūlu mādhā ujib'tum qālū lā ʿil'ma lanā innaka anta ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi
